message.name: ERR_XFV_ATTACHMENT_TYPE
message.locale: Only one type of attached document can be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXTERNAL_DOCUMENT
message.locale: An external document must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DOCUMENT_REFERENCE_LOCATION
message.locale: A document reference and a document location must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MAINTAIN_ACTIVE
message.locale: Decision attachments can only be maintained for active appeal cases.

message.name: ERR_XRV_STATUS_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot modify a canceled decision attachment.

message.name: ERR_FV_DELETED
message.locale: The decision attachment has already been deleted.
